text: Raul Fernandez Arrizabalaga (born January 13, 1972 in Luarca) is a cyclist and judo athlete from Spain. He has a disability: He is blind and is a B2 type athlete. He competed at the 1996 Summer Paralympics in cycling. He competed at the 2004 Summer Paralympics in judo. He finished third in the Up to 90 Kg Open group. == References == Category:Spanish cyclists Category:Living people Category:1972 births Category:Paralympic bronze medalists for Spain Category:1996 Summer Paralympics Category:2004 Summer Paralympics Category:Sportspeople with disabilities, type B2 Category:People from Asturias Category:Spanish judoka
